summary:
A results-oriented professional with over 10 years experience in international supply chain management. Successful in identifying processes to establish, maintain and improve productivity of inventory, procurement and logistics. Strong ability to thrive in situations of ambiguity as well as under firm deadlines. Proven record of leading teams in harsh environments and under extreme pressure. Experience in the areas of high value retail, mining, trucking, and aviation.

Supply chain software expertise includes SAP, GreenTree, MEX, and Pastel inventory systems.
